verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Up from the grave He arose, newline With a mighty triumph o'er His foes; newline He arose a victor newline From the dark domain newline And He lives forever newline With His saints to reign. newline He arose! He arose! newline Hallelujah! Christ arose!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Low in the grave He lay, newline Jesus my Savior! newline Waiting the coming day, newline Jesus my Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Vainly they watch His bed, newline Jesus my Savior! newline Vainly they seal the dead, newline Jesus my Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Death cannot keep his prey, newline Jesus my Savior! newline He tore the bars away, newline Jesus my Lord!
